name: By Gone Era
description:
By Gone Era is set in the year 2150 in this game you fight people can faze through walls and you need to fight an unkown foe at the end. you are a unknown peoson sent on a journy. 

_________________________________________________________________

features:

-8 levles

-hack and slash

-platformer

-30min game

_________________________________________________________________

Controlls:

Use WAD to move and jump around the levels, use the mouse to attack and climb walls.
